item.title: Pamidi - Control PulseAudio with a MIDI device
item.description: My first project posted publicly. Initially I didn’t expect to post it, but I didn’t see any other solutions to the problem I was having, so I figured my solution could inspire someone else to do it better. Problem: Physical Volume Knobs for Applications While using Windows, I installed an application called MIDI Mixer to map the physical volume knobs of my Behringer X-Touch Mini (and the accompanying mute and media control buttons) to individual applications on my PC.
